info.title: Central Purchase Contract
info.description: With this inbound service, you can create and maintain central purchase contracts and central purchase contract hierarchies. This service is based on the OData protocol and can be consumed by external systems and other interfaces. This service contains entities, such as header, header distribution, header partner, header notes, subordinate central contract, item, item distribution, item partner, item notes, item condition validity, item condition amount, item condition scales, distribution message, legal transaction, and version history. This service allows purchasers from various parts of the company at different locations to take advantage of the negotiated global agreement with suppliers.

x-sap-shortText: Read, update, and create central purchase contracts using this inbound API

values.text: SAP S/4HANA Procurement Hub - Central Contract Management Integration(SAP_COM_0243)

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Procurement: Purchasing Document Distribution (MM_PURDOC_DISTRIBUTION)
* Procurement: Purchasing Document (MM_PURDOC_HEADER)
* Procurement: Purchasing Document Item (MM_PURDOC_ITEM)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

get.summary: Gets the header details of the central purchase contracts and central purchase contract hierarchies in the system
get.description: Gets the header details of all the central purchase contracts  and central purchase contract hierarchies in the system. This operation filters and sorts the returned data. Note that if there are many central purchase contracts and central purchase contract hierarchies in the system, this operation might take a while.

post.description: Creates a new central purchase contract or central purchase contract hierarchy with one or more items. It validates the correctness of the payload. In case the validation fails, it returns the errors in the response.

get.summary: Gets the header details of a subordinate central contract.

parameters.name: $select

post.summary: Withdraws a central purchase contract or central purchase contract hierarchy from approval
post.description: Withdraws a central purchase contract or central purchase contract hierarchy from approval. The document is then available for further modification. It is mandatory to pass the number of the central purchase contract or central purchase contract hierarchy provided.

parameters.name: CentralPurchaseContract
parameters.description:
Central Purchase Contract  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

post.summary: Assigns a legal transaction to a central purchase contract or central purchase contract hierarchy
post.description: Assigns a legal transaction to a central purchase contract or central purchase contract hierarchy. It is mandatory to pass the number of the central purchase contract or central purchase contract hierarchy and the legal transaction number provided.

parameters.name: LegalTransactionId
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

parameters.name: CentralPurchaseContract
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

post.summary: Unassigns a legal transaction from a central purchase contract or central purchase contract hierarchy
post.description: Unassigns a legal transaction from a central purchase contract or central purchase contract hierarchy. It is mandatory to pass the linked object UUID of the legal transaction.

parameters.name: Legaltransactionlinkdobjuuid
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

post.summary: Cancels and releases a central purchase contract or central purchase contract hierarchy
post.description: Cancels and releases a central purchase contract or central purchase contract hierarchy. It deletes all the items and distribution lines of the document. It is mandatory to pass the number of the central purchase contract or central purchase contract hierarchy provided. Note that documents that are canceled cannot be further modified.

parameters.name: CentralPurchaseContract
parameters.description:
Central Purchase Contract  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)
